title: Poor Darius...

embed.description: This is a WORK IN PROGRESS POST - Today' s Patch out but the PBE still down ] The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers!

body:
Darius
Noxian Guillotine (R) has been reverted back to live functionality.
Mana cost reverted to 100 mana at all ranks from 100/50/0
New Effect: At rank 3, Noxian Guillotine's cooldown resets entirely on kill removed.

Looks like the dunkmaster is gonna continue to be feast or famine, and outclassed by everyone else.  RIP
